about.description: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
about.summary: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.

name: antlr-cpp-runtime

about.description: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
about.summary: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "antlr-cpp-runtime" %}
{% set version = "4.12.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://www.antlr.org/download/antlr4-cpp-runtime-{{ version }}-source.zip
  sha256: 642d59854ddc0cebb5b23b2233ad0a8723eef20e66ef78b5b898d0a67556893b

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('antlr-cpp-runtime', max_pin='x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - pkg-config 

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libantlr4-runtime${SHLIB_EXT}

about:
  home: https://www.antlr.org/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
  description: |
    ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
  dev_url: https://github.com/antlr/antlr4

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - timkpaine
